titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2846) to prohibit spending Federal education funds on national testing without explicit and specific legislation.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 105-413, by Mr. Linder.
Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2846. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 142.

action.text: On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 220 - 185 (Roll no. 8).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 2/4/1998--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (open) for the consideration of H.R. 2846 (Federal education funds for national testing).
